Html:
Compared my stats directly ingame and on armory, then loaded my name in rawr and there is a difference in my Spell Crit Rate by 5%.
ingame and on armory it's 222 Crit rating that translates into 21.35% crit chance, in rawr however it also says 222 but here it translates into 27.35%.

any idea as to why ?
Which is 6% crit. Are you fire? Critical Mass = 6% crit with fire spells.
